actions.description: The spider makes two Bite attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with a use of Web Bomb.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 14 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 14 to hit, range 300 ft./600 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage, and the target and all creatures within 10 feet of it must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) acid damage and have the restrained condition until the start of the spider's next turn.
actions.name: Web Bomb

specialTraits.description: If the spider fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
specialTraits.name: Spider Climb

specialTraits.description: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.
specialTraits.name: Web Walker
